oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for payment of per capita tax to Grand Army of the Republic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a receipt for the payment of per capita tax on local members of the Ellsworth Post No. 32, Grand Army of the Republic paid to the Headquarters Department of Tennessee. The receipt shows the funds were received of G. W. Conaster, the GAR post commander. The Ellsworth Post was located in Fentress County, Tennessee. George W. Conaster served as a private in Co. D, 2nd Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA during the war.
